entry.title: The Undo-Redo
entry.summary:
Author: SpaceflowerGrace

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,672Chapters: 7/9Kudos: 78

Summary: Nightwing is hit by a spell that has takes about a decade off his age. This whole situation would be a footnote in a report if that were the only problem, but about a decade ago he didn’t know Jason, Tim or Damian. Dick had left the vigilant life behind so he wasn’t in contact with Bruce or anyone from their teams and communities. Oh and Bruce is off world with Clark and Diana so there is no help from that corner.His other little problem doesn’t appear in any aspect of this life he now lives and he is left to ask what happened?

entry.title: til you don't choose "right"
entry.summary:
Author: alexndr_writes

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,212Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 3

Summary: After years of pining, Kon El and Tim Drake finally shut the hell up and kiss each other. It’s a beautiful, romantic makeout session that leads to them being in a compromising position. Multiple positions, if you want to be historically accurate about the ordeal.Of course in a heat of passion, a lapse in remembering birth control, and the condom breaking… Yeah, these boys were doomed. So, so doomed.After discovering his pregnancy, Tim has to make a decision that will shape his future forever. Kon is completely on board (as a supportive boyfriend should be). But keeping his trans identity, his queer identity, and his mpreg nightmare a secret from his family of detectives? Ha, good luck Tim.OR: Author gets angry about reproductive healthcare being at risk (again) and writes out his nightmare scenario!Title is from the song "How Am I Supposed To Love Myself?" By Beth McCarthy

entry.title: All I Ever Needed Was You
entry.summary:
Author: feelmyheartbeat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,650Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 24

Summary: He couldn’t do this. He just… He couldn’t. It was too much, all of it was too much. While Tim knew that he should try a different position, maybe kneeling by the bed again to let gravity help, but the mere thought of trying to move at all as he was being ripped apart from the inside was too overwhelming. All Tim could do was sob as another contraction crashed into him. He couldn’t even try to push, his strength all but evaporated, but the pain didn’t give him any reprieve. It had already been hours, long hours of building agony, hours where he had trembled and he had gasped and he had outright writhed as the baby refused to descend any further. Tim had tried bracing against the bed, he’d tried standing up outright and even pacing before his legs had started shaking too much to hold his weight. While it had been hours since feeling the urge to push, it had been longer still since those first cramps had become unmistakably contractions.

entry.title: Rescue Mission ABORT!
entry.summary:
Author: Sleepy_P

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,177Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 28

Summary: Tim jumped on the chair and rolled toward the desk. This will make his search so much easier! Maybe he could find a map of the building or any information about where his brothers were. He hoped they were actually there with him… If their captors had separated them, it would make it more difficult. Not impossible, of course. His white skin was almost shining blue under the lights of the many screens as Tim’s fingers danced on the keyboard.Quickly, he found a security camera program and clicked on it. All twelve computer screens froze before coming back to life. And, Tim’s eyes widened in front of the scenes shown to him: Red Hood, Nightwing, Robin. All three were there being— Or: Tim wakes up alone in a cell after a mission turned sour, escapes, and finds his three brothers in delicate situations... and instead of saving them, he decides to watch the show and gets to see his wildest fantasies in 4K.

entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,182Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 79

Summary: Magic has rules. Some of them are… blurry. It saves the heart destined to love you—your name on their lips, and theirs echoing in every resonant beat of your heart. Soulmates bound by a power greater than themselves. Demanding and corrosive, magic forgot about human free will. And about how stupid humans could be. Jason didn’t think Robin was stupid.Which made the teenager an obvious threat. What the fuck was he trying to achieve by putting himself in danger just to force a soulmate bond with Jason?

entry.title: And That We Call Being
entry.summary:
Author: oldrockformations

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,111Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 407

Summary: “I’m Sorry?” If Tim's… friend (would Tim get shot if he were to call Jason his brother?) is feeling particularly gregarious, they might chat about light subjects—the latest trafficking ring Jason's brought down, the newest security measures government agencies have implemented to try and keep Tim out, whatever shenanigans their assorted siblings and sibling-adjacent friends are getting into. But they've always avoided any conversation topics that might be considered heavier. Namely: feelings. It's been a perfectly normal Tuesday morning so far. They haven't exchanged any words today, other than a dry greeting when Tim sat down half-an-hour ago. There's no way they're about to have this conversation right here, right now. "Do you ever think about being a woman?"   Or Jason comes to terms with the idea that he might be a woman, and realizes how loved she is in the process Or Orjesus christ can u imagine the sociopolitical impacts of the red hood coming out as trans
